pages.privacy-policy: Transform Your Event into a Casino Extravaganza with Lucky Chip Rentals Lucky Chip Rentals Contact About Service Get Lucky Tonight with Lucky Chip Rentals! Privacy Policy At Lucky Chip Rentals, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard the information you provide to us. 1. Information Collection We may collect personal information from you when you interact with our website, contact us via email or phone, or engage with our services. This information may include your name, contact details, payment information, and any other details you provide to us. 2. Use of Information We use the information we collect to provide and improve our services, process your rental requests, communicate with you, and personalize your experience with Lucky Chip Rentals. Your information may also be used for marketing purposes, such as sending promotional offers or updates about our services. 3. Data Security We take the security of your information seriously and implement measures to protect it from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. Your personal data is stored securely and only accessed by authorized personnel for legitimate business purposes. 4. Information Sharing We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as required by law or to fulfill our services to you. We may share your information with trusted partners who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you. 5. Cookies and Tracking Our website may use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze website traffic, and personalize content. You can choose to disable cookies in your browser settings, but this may affect the functionality of our website. 6. Third-Party Links Our website may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these third parties. We recommend reviewing the privacy policies of any external sites you visit. 7. Email Communication By providing your email address to Lucky Chip Rentals, you consent to receive email communications from us regarding your rental requests, promotions, and updates about our services. You can opt out of these communications at any time by contacting us at luckychiprentals@gmail.com. 8. Data Retention We will retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. 9. Contact Us If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding your personal information or this Privacy Policy, please contact us at luckychiprentals@gmail.com. By using our services or interacting with our website, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. We may update this policy periodically, and any changes will be reflected on this page. Thank you for trusting Lucky Chip Rentals with your personal information. pages.terms-conditions: Experience the Thrill of Casino Gaming with Our Premium Equipment Lucky Chip Rentals Contact About Service Get Lucky Tonight with Lucky Chip Rentals! Terms and Conditions 1. Introduction Lucky Chip Rentals ("Lucky Chip Rentals" or "we") provides casino equipment rental services to its customers ("Customers" or "you"). These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") govern the use of Lucky Chip Rentals' services and the rental of its equipment. By using Lucky Chip Rentals' services or renting its equipment, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms. 2. Rental Agreement The rental agreement ("Rental Agreement") between Lucky Chip Rentals and you will be effective upon your acceptance of these Terms and the execution of a written rental agreement. The Rental Agreement will specify the terms and conditions of the rental, including the duration of the rental, the type and quantity of equipment rented, and the rental fee. 3. Equipment Rental Lucky Chip Rentals will provide the equipment specified in the Rental Agreement to you for the duration of the rental. You agree to use the equipment solely for the purpose of the event or activity specified in the Rental Agreement and to return the equipment in the same condition as when it was rented, reasonable wear and tear excepted. 4. Payment Terms You agree to pay the rental fee specified in the Rental Agreement, which will be due and payable upon the execution of the Rental Agreement. The rental fee will be non-refundable unless otherwise agreed upon in writing by Lucky Chip Rentals. 5. Cancellation Policy If you cancel the rental agreement more than 30 days prior to the start date of the rental, you will be entitled to a full refund of the rental fee. If you cancel the rental agreement less than 30 days prior to the start date of the rental, you will be entitled to a 50% refund of the rental fee. If you cancel the rental agreement less than 14 days prior to the start date of the rental, you will not be entitled to a refund. 6. Liability Lucky Chip Rentals will not be liable for any damages or losses arising from the use of the equipment, including but not limited to damage to the equipment, damage to property, or personal injury. You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Lucky Chip Rentals against any claims, damages, or expenses arising from the use of the equipment. 7. Intellectual Property Lucky Chip Rentals retains all intellectual property rights in and to the equipment, including but not limited to patents, trademarks, copyrights, and trade secrets. You agree not to reproduce, modify, or distribute the equipment or any part thereof without the prior written consent of Lucky Chip Rentals. 8. Confidentiality Lucky Chip Rentals will maintain the confidentiality of all information provided by you in connection with the rental agreement, including but not limited to your personal and financial information. You agree to maintain the confidentiality of all information provided by Lucky Chip Rentals in connection with the rental agreement. 9. Governing Law These Terms will be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of [State]. Any disputes arising from these Terms will be resolved through binding arbitration in accordance with the rules of the American Arbitration Association. 10. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns regarding these Terms, please contact us at: luckychiprentals@gmail.com 11. Amendments Lucky Chip Rentals reserves the right to amend these Terms at any time without notice. Your continued use of Lucky Chip Rentals' services or rental of its equipment will constitute your acceptance of any amendments to these Terms. 12. Entire Agreement These Terms constitute the entire agreement between Lucky Chip Rentals and you and supersede all prior or contemporaneous agreements or understandings, whether written or oral. By using Lucky Chip Rentals' services or renting its equipment, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms.
